metadata.source: M&A News, Press Releases, Industry Reports, Web Search, PE-Insights, S&P Global
metadata.region: Nordic Only (Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, Iceland)
metadata.verified: All deals verified against public sources

active_deals.deal_name: Nordic Capital XI - Chr. Hansen Acquisition
active_deals.description: Nordic Capital acquired Chr. Hansen in one of the largest Nordic PE deals ever
Triton merged Assemblin and Caverion to create leading Northern European multi-technical service group
